cells.data: -- draw :: Tree String -> [String]on draw(tree)		-- shift :: String -> String -> [String] -> [String]	script shift		on |λ|(strFirst, strOther, xs)			zipWith(my append, ¬				cons(strFirst, replicate((length of xs) - 1, strOther)), xs)		end |λ|	end script		-- drawSubTrees :: [Tree String] -> [String]	script drawSubTrees		on |λ|(xs)			set lng to length of xs			if lng > 0 then				if lng > 1 then					cons("│", append(shift's |λ|("├─ ", "│  ", draw(item 1 of xs)), ¬						|λ|(items 2 thru -1 of xs)))				else					cons("│", shift's |λ|("└─ ", "   ", draw(item 1 of xs)))				end if			else				{}			end if		end |λ|	end script		paragraphs of (root of tree) & |λ|(nest of tree) of drawSubTreesend draw
